timepieces
Class WristWatch

java.lang.Object
  timepieces.AnalogClock
      timepieces.WristWatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
WeekdayCalendar
public class WristWatch
extends AnalogClock
implements WeekdayCalendar

This class implements an analog wrist watch which maintains the current time and (half-)day of the week.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Colin Fidge
